title: INOX Leisure Ltd announces Takeover of operations of Multiplex Cinema Theatre
content: INOX Leisure Ltd:Has taken over operations of Multiplex Cinema Theatre located R-21 R-World, Old Rajshree Cinema, Plot No. 141, Sector 21, Near Akshardham Mandir, Gandhinagar - 382021 having 6 Screens and 686 seats with effect from Sep. 01.
